sentences:
Wonder Boys is a 2000 comedy - drama film directed by Curtis Hanson and written by Steve Kloves .
An international co - production between the United States , the United Kingdom , Germany , and Japan , it is based on the novel of the same name by Michael Chabon .
Michael Douglas stars as professor Grady Tripp , a novelist who teaches creative writing at a university but has been unable to finish his second novel .
The film was shot in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania , including locations at Carnegie Mellon University , Chatham University , and Shady Side Academy .
Other Pennsylvania locations included Beaver , Rochester and Rostraver Township .
After the film failed at the box office , there was a second attempt to find an audience with a new marketing campaign and a November 8 , 2000 re - release , which was also a financial disappointment .
